00023 #include "copynumber/CNProbe.h"

00025 /**
00026  * Constructor.
00027 */
00028 CNProbe::CNProbe()
00029 {
00030   m_iProbeSetIndex = -1;
00031   m_cAllele = 0;
00032   m_uiProbeID = 0;
00033   m_fIntensity = 0;
00034   m_fResidual = 0;
00035   m_dProbeEffect = 0;
00036   m_bUseForSketch = false;
00037   m_fMedianIntensity = 0;
00038   m_fPredictedIntensity = 0;
00039   m_nPDNNBin = 0;
00040 }
00041 
00042 /**
00043  * Compare function.
00044  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00045  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00046  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00047 */
00048 int CNProbe::compareTo(CNProbe& that, int iCompareCode)
00049 {
00050   int iCompareResult = 0;
00051   switch (iCompareCode) {
00052   case 0:
00053     iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(m_iProbeSetIndex, that.m_iProbeSetIndex);
00054     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00055       iCompareResult = AffxArray<char>::compare(m_cAllele, that.m_cAllele);
00056     }
00057     break;
00058   case 1:
00059     iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiProbeID, that.m_uiProbeID);
00060     break;
00061   case 2:
00062     iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(m_iProbeSetIndex, that.m_iProbeSetIndex);
00063     break;
00064   case 3:
00065     iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(m_iProbeSetIndex, that.m_iProbeSetIndex);
00066     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00067       iCompareResult = AffxArray<char>::compare(m_cAllele, that.m_cAllele);
00068     }
00069     if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00070       iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(m_uiProbeID, that.m_uiProbeID);
00071     }
00072     break;
00073   }
00074   return iCompareResult;
00075 }
00076 
00077 CNProbeArray::CNProbeArray() {}
00078 CNProbeArray::~CNProbeArray()
00079 {
00080   deleteAll();
00081 }
00082 
00083 unsigned int CNProbeArray::getMaximumNumberProbesPerProbeSet()
00084 {
00085   // Determine the maximum number of probes for a probe set
00086   quickSort(0); // by ProbeSet index, by allele
00087   unsigned int uiMaxProbeCount = 0;
00088   unsigned int uiProbeCount = 0;
00089   CNProbe* pPrev = NULL;
00090   for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < getCount()); iIndex++) {
00091     CNProbe* p = getAt(iIndex);
00092     if (p->getProbeSetIndex() == -1) {
00093       continue;
00094     }
00095     if ((pPrev == NULL) || (pPrev->compareTo(*p, 0) == 0)) {
00096       if (pPrev == NULL) {
00097         pPrev = p;
00098       }
00099       uiProbeCount++;
00100     } else {
00101       if (uiProbeCount > uiMaxProbeCount) {
00102         uiMaxProbeCount = uiProbeCount;
00103       }
00104       pPrev = p;
00105       uiProbeCount = 1;
00106     }
00107   }
00108   if (uiProbeCount > uiMaxProbeCount) {
00109     uiMaxProbeCount = uiProbeCount;
00110   }
00111   return uiMaxProbeCount;
00112 }
